docs.snippet: French security officials, sobered by the destabilizing effect that computer hacking and email leaks had on the U.S. election, have taken the unprecedented step of allowing government cyber-snoops share their expertise with political parties....
docs.lead_paragraph: French security officials, sobered by the destabilizing effect that computer hacking and email leaks had on the U.S. election, have taken the unprecedented step of allowing government cyber-snoops share their expertise with political parties.

headline.main: After US Election Hacks, France Girds Against Cyberattacks
headline.print_headline: After US Election Hacks, France Girds Against Cyberattacks

docs.snippet: A Hillary Clinton supporter has sued Alaska's three electoral college voters, trying to prevent them from casting votes for President-elect Donald Trump....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Hillary Clinton supporter has sued Alaska's three electoral college voters, trying to prevent them from casting votes for President-elect Donald Trump.

headline.main: Alaska Asks Suit Against Electors Be Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Alaska Asks Suit Against Electors Be Dismissed

docs.snippet: The sharp divisions left by last month's presidential election have cast more attention than usual on the Electoral College. The Associated Press attempted to talk to all 538 electors to get an idea of the pressure they are under, what they think ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sharp divisions left by last month's presidential election have cast more attention than usual on the Electoral College. The Associated Press attempted to talk to all 538 electors to get an idea of the pressure they are under, what they think about their Constitutional duty and what they make of longshot efforts to derail Donald Trump's ascension to the White House when they meet Monday.

docs.snippet: The Obama administration suggested Thursday that Russian President Vladimir Putin personally authorized the hacking of Democratic officials' email accounts in the run-up to the presidential election and said it was "fact" that such actions helped ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration suggested Thursday that Russian President Vladimir Putin personally authorized the hacking of Democratic officials' email accounts in the run-up to the presidential election and said it was "fact" that such actions helped Donald Trump's campaign. The White House also assailed Trump himself, saying he must have known of Russia's interference.

headline.main: White House Suggests Putin Was Involved in US Hacking
headline.print_headline: White House Suggests Putin Was Involved in US Hacking

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc said on Thursday it will introduce tools to prevent fake news stories from spreading on its platform, an about-face in response to rising criticism that it did not do enough to combat the problem during the U.S. presidential campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: Facebook Inc said on Thursday it will introduce tools to prevent fake news stories from spreading on its platform, an about-face in response to rising criticism that it did not do enough to combat the problem during the U.S. presidential campaign.

headline.main: Facebook to Roll Out New Tools to Tackle Fake News
headline.print_headline: Facebook to Roll Out New Tools to Tackle Fake News

docs.snippet: It's time for America to get up to speed again on the Electoral College, that oddball way the nation selects its president every four years....
docs.lead_paragraph: It's time for America to get up to speed again on the Electoral College, that oddball way the nation selects its president every four years.

headline.main: Founding Fathers Distrusted Popular Vote to Pick a President
headline.print_headline: Founding Fathers Distrusted Popular Vote to Pick a President
